tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The consultation was very explanatory and I had a clear view on the symptoms I am having. Dr. has been very empathetic throughout the consultation.

I wanted to express my deepest gratitude for the exceptional care and attention by Dr. Sachin Bansal ,Dr. Nidhi Bansal and your team have consistently provided me and my family over the past few years.

Since 2017, your clinic has been our go-to place for all our dental needs, and every visit has only reinforced our trust in your expertise and professionalism. Your humble and caring demeanor, coupled with the genuine concern you show for your patients, sets you apart in the field of dentistry.

I will never forget the time when I was hit by a ball on my face and was in immense discomfort. Despite visiting several doctors who couldn't diagnose my problem, you were able to pinpoint the issue and treat it with the utmost patience and skill. Your ability to listen attentively and your dedication to finding the right solution truly made a world of difference for me.

Beyond your exceptional clinical skills, it's your kindness and willingness to go above and beyond that truly make you stand out. 

Thank you once again for everything you do. I feel truly fortunate to have you as my dentist, and I look forward to many more years of receiving outstanding care from you and your team.

Warm regards,
Renu Mongia

I would have chosen "can't say" if there was such an option. For most of the cases I could easily recommend Doctor Sachin but I happened to have bad luck to be a patient of him who faced some painful experience just 1 month after leaving his clinic because of some negligence from his part.

I applied for the full Orthodontist treatment for Braces from Dr. Sachin. He was great in beginning but after that when whole world went into COVID I was not able to visit him at the time of the appointments but still kept on wearing retainers.

For the last step of the process Dr. Sachin told me that he will do the scaling to remove the sediments he put on the teeth to fix the wires and also adjust the gaps if there were some.

But when I went to him after COVID he didn't even mention both of them and told me that to fix the gaps there will be a need of some new process which will cost extra. He did a complete checkup and told me that everything is fine, and that he will not do anything more for my braces treatment and that anything more will be for only cosmetic reasons.

I was fine with that. And decided to give him 4 stars as I was fine with some small gaps. But fast forward a month I can see that I was quite hasty to even have that opinion.

Since he didn't do the final adjustments and didn't do a proper checkup a small gap not visible to me was left between the top right molars. It was such a small gap that even toothbrush didn't went there. It was created during the braces treatment and now I got a cavity in there. Even at the time of the writing I have it and have scheduled another dentist to fix it.

Not only that, Dr. Sachin did a complete checkup and charged me for it. But he didn't even check the lower right wisdom teeth. It had not come out properly and there is still some tissue over it. He told me everything is fine, but this week I got an infection there. And after visiting a similarly qualified Dentist I was shocked to know that there was a cavity there. Now there will be a need to not only cut the tissue and get the Wisdom tooth out but also to see how damaging this cavity is.

I came to know about the SR Dental implants because of our family doctor. Uncle treated me with so much expertise that I still remember his treatments, Dr Sachin is his Nephew and he claimed that he will be a professional and family friendly just like him, and he was, only in the beginning. Now only after a month of visiting to him from Haryana I am getting to know that there were two critical cavities in my mouth. I thought that proper brushing and regular check-ups were enough for my dental hygiene but now it seems that I was naive to put all my confidence in him.

In the end first I thought to rate his clinic 5 stars, then 4, and now 1 or even less than 1. He was unprofessional in his last checkup and I am really surprised on how can he miss not one but two cavities, he could have seen one just by blowing some air on the tissue over the wisdom tooth. But I guess there was no need of doing that from his point of view.

Honestly, I would not have any bad feelings toward him if I faced these complications a year or so after the last checkup as I could only take it as my fault for not showing up for a regular checkup. This issue could have been resolved peacefully if Doctor Sachin had a little more due diligence. I would not have felt so much pain for days and he would not have got a bad review.

My review may be a minority one. Maybe the only 1 star review. Many must have liked him and went home happy. But let my review remind you all that he is not perfect like everyone of us and can make some gross mistakes which can harm you in long run. And for me, I am scheduled for a surgery tomorrow, let's see what happens.

Edit: Had some communication with Doctor Sachin and can say that this was just an unfortunate case. My case will be in minority. In most of the cases you will get no problem at all, I guess it was my bad luck that he made a small negligence which also had a small probability with the doctor of his calibre and knowledge.

We also took our son to S R  dental clinic for the treatment   because his teeth were crooked and for the treatment of teeth, Dr. Sachin advised us to get braces. According to him, we got braces fitted to our son and the result after getting the brace fitted was commendable and now that his braces have been removed and retainers have been fitted, earlier he was shy in taking pictures. But now he is able to smile openly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: **************  ******* I went to clinic to consult for my father who is 85 years old after taking proper appointment at 11.00 AM on phone on same day at 10.15 AM. We reached there at 10.50 AM. The receptionist informed Dr immediately about us on call. We were told to wait as Dr was in his residence at upper floor of the clinic. We waited for 30 minutes but Dr did not come. When we again asked at 11.25 AM from receptionist, she called Dr and informed him about us waiting for him. Then receptionist informed us that Dr is not coming. Reason was given that he is busy in lab. Very unprofessional behaviour on part of Dr. Clinic was totally vacant and no patient was there. It shows how good is this Dr and his practice. I am the resident of Pitampura and I advise the residents of this area to think twice before visiting SR Dental Implants clinic at Pitampura.

I had been having my tooth problem for the last many years and visited number of doctors not only in the nearby area but far areas too.Suddenly I received a pamphlet in the morning newspaper and initially went for the full month opg.
Initially I consulted with Dr Sachin and found him to be not only impressive but full of confidence and I started getting the treatment.
On my first visit due to some emergency doctor failed to attend me but to my surprise he called all the staff on the next day I.e Sunday and attended me
The treatment was given up to my satisfaction with reasonable charges which I would not have got at other professional clinics where the doctors keeps on changing and every time a new doctor attends you.
Since then I have referred my near and dear ones up to the remarkable satisfaction as a feedback
Re

review: Very good experience. My son got braces treatment from Dr. Sachin .He is very polite, patient in explaining everything, and spent a good amount of time. He gave good treatment even for minute-minute things. I must say he is one of the best caring Dentists.We had a very pleasant experience. Thank you, Dr. Sachin for your time and treatment.

review:
I underwent treatment with both Sachin and Ashish Bansal in the practice. 

Dr Sachin Bansal is extremely knowledgeable and friendly. He explained my dental problem in great detail and was very patient with follow up questions. He was very accommodating of my scheduling requests and regularly followed up to enquire about my healing which was fantastic. 

Dr Ashish Bansal was equally helpful and was very patient with my upteen requests. 

I strongly recommend the clinic based on my personal experience.
reply_text: Thanks for your appreciation Sir...

review: Excellent treatment! Friendly behavior! The doctor is very cooperative and knowledgeable. He gives ample time for the treatment of f the patient.
Good experience . Friendly doctor. Gave good explanation to all the questions. Will surely recommend the doctor

Experienced, intelligent and patient enough to hear all the problem. The doctor has checked first the basic formation of dental structure (TMJ) and then has asked for the problem. He has made me understood the medical problem in a lay man language and has suggested possible course of actions. Nominal and economic charges along with good service after the treatment. Suggestive.
reply_text: Thanks for the kind words...

review: I was having trouble with my teeth. I visited the clinic for the treatment. Dr. Sachin operated the RCT. The prices were very reasonable. I was treated very well. ******** *** **** ******* **** **** ***** Would be happy to suggest my friends and family for their dental problems.

Doctors are very nice and they handled the whole situation very nicely . everyone is very polite . tooth problems were explained in detail . treatment was really very effective. My husband did not face any problem in that area in the past three days . we are happy with the treatment.

It is good to see the last feedbacks come into action, makes the pacient feel important and I think there could be a day only for all the pacients travelling from far places, which would make the pacients to make that day as the dentist day!
Thank you

I had a tooth problem so I met Dr sachin he advised me to meet a neuro surgeon it was relate with it Dr was absulet correct saying . now I m almost OK thanks Dr.sachin to give me correct advise now I want to fix my tooth .it had to broken due to the tooth ache.

The  experience has been great. I started my braces course in the middle with SR Dentals as I was not satisfied with my then dentist and no doubt I have not had any trouble since joining doctor Sachin. Our association has been pretty great and not once I regretted my decision of getting treated here.

I am completely satisfied with the treatment going on right now although it has been a very long procedure I am happy with the way my  teeth have been treated and I recommend everyone to come here 
The doctor who was treating me was also very kind friendly and polite the whole treatment was explained properly and the consequences were also been told which was a really good quality.the treatment is still going on and it's not painful and I am sure that the result of my teeth will be excellent!

I started the treatment of my teeth from S R Dental Clinic about two yeas back. In the first phase I started with my braces treatment and now am getting my implants done. Both Dr Sachin Bansal and Dr Nidhi Bansal have given excellent treatment with which I am very much satisfied. I shall always remain thankful to them and would prefer that other patients with dental problems take treatment from them.

Dr Sachin is extremely reliable and sincere professional. He took a great care during the course of my treatment. The clinical set up is world class and very hygienic. I would recommend for anyone to visit him for their dental problems and he will definitely provide the best treatment.
